name: Dream Diver
description:
Dive deeper into dreams within dreams within dreams within dreams within dreams within dreams~~~~

How to Play video

**Download runs better than WebGL!

CONTROLS

 - WASD + Arrow keys to move

 - HOLD left click to charge up sedative, release to fire, OR right click to cancel

 - Hold R to restart at level 1

 - P to Pause

1. Find the target (red guy)

2. Charge your sedative and fire at the target. Hitting the target will put them to sleep, and you will enter their dream. 

a. The number represents how many seconds the target will fall asleep, but for each successive dream level you enter, the previous targets time slows down by half. 

3. In their dream, there will be a new target. Repeat steps 1 and 2. 

4. Shoot Blue NPCs to collect additional sedative ammo AND powerups. 

UPDATE:

Fixed colliders for traintracks

Side timer works a little better. 

Fixed colliders for powerups.
